WRITING.TITLE: Starbucks IT systems have crashed. Thousands of stores down, but giving away free coffee (I just got one)

WRITING.TEXT: The explanation I got was that they did an IT system upgrade last night and suspect that may be the problem. The IT tech was busy trying to solve the issue, while the baristas were even busier giving away free cups of brew.

WRITING.TITLE: Thousands of Starbucks are down right now. They can't sell coffee, but many are giving away free drinks (I just got a freebie)

WRITING.TEXT: Comes up often in university philosophy courses, about the infinite regress problem of cosmology, trying to solve what came first in time

Dammit. I was like, "Now I get to feel smart and use my turtles-all-the-way-down reference". But wait, I'd better Ctrl+F first to make sure nobody beat me to the punch.
And now I will return to my nerd cave silently, bemoaning the missed opportunity.
Unlike me. Year after year my annual reviews at work produce the same singular positive attribute: "Low performer, but seems to be self-aware of what a dumbass he is."

I was like, "Wait, but..." having the same memory.
But I was wrong. Even has a Snopes entry: http://www.snopes.com/sinbad-movie-shazaam/

WRITING.TITLE: By publicly declaring that I have "the best mom in the world" on Mothers' Day, I'm casually dissing all your moms as second-rate
